text: we are e Transitions and we're the 2012
winners of the social Venture track of
the HBS business plan contest we see
ourselves as the faircast meets Open
Table of healthcare our platform uses
two forecasting models which is the
faircast part of what we do one model
predicts when patients will be leaving a
hospital and the other model predicts
when skilled nursing facility beds will
come open for these patients we then
take this information and our
sophisticated algorithm matches the
patient that are leaving a hospital with
beds that are about to become available
the last part um that sort of brings
everything together these matching and
predictive capabilities is the Open
Table part of what we do and essentially
we are an online nursing facility bed
reservation platform that hospitals can
use to book beds for patients that are
going to need post-acute care after
discharge why we're so excited about e
transitions is that it adds value for
all the key stakeholders in the
discharge process
so for patients this represents higher
quality of care and for hospitals and
skilled nursing facilities e transitions
will deliver increased productivity
increased efficiency higher thorough put
and for Society at large this represents
a 5 billion healthc care savings
opportunity demand for solution like
ours is on the rise in light of the
regulatory changes that are happening in
healthcare there's a rise of accountable
care organizations that aim to reshape
the way reimbursement in healthcare
works this Market is so underpenetrated
today about 3/4 of all hospitals still
perform their discharges manually it's
been such a great opportunity to be part
of this business plan contest at Harvard
Business School because we've received
such good mentoring and feedback from
just going through the process I think
in the classroom we get really inspired
by by all the problems that we can
address but going through this process
shows you how to execute we are planning
to run a pilot this fall at um one of
the local prominent hospitals in this
area and they're Affiliated Skilled
Nursing Facility so our prize money will
help to go and fund that our vision for
E transitions is that this is a model
that can be scaled up Nationwide to
every hospital if I were to say what
would be my dream 5 10 years out it
would be to change the way that
discharge planning is done and really
streamline that transition process from
the hospital to the postacute setting
